18 from threading import Thread, Lock
19 import RPi.GPIO as GPIO
20 import rospy
21 
22 from ..common.io_objects import PinMode, NiryoIO
23 
24 from .hardware.DACx0501 import DACx0501
25 from .hardware.MCP23017 import MCP23017, RegistersMCP23017
26 
27 
28 class McpIOManager(object):
29 
30  def __init__(self, mcp=None):
31  self.__mcp = mcp if mcp is not None else MCP23017(address=rospy.get_param("~mcp/address"),
32  busnum=rospy.get_param("~mcp/i2c_bus"))
33 
34  self.__lock = Lock()
35 
36  self.__inputs = {}
37  self.__outputs = {}
38 
39  self.__callbacks = {}
40 
41  interrupt_BCM = rospy.get_param("~mcp/interrupt_bcm")
42  GPIO.setwarnings(False)
43  GPIO.setmode(GPIO.BCM)
44  GPIO.setup(interrupt_BCM, GPIO.IN)
45  GPIO.add_event_detect(interrupt_BCM, GPIO.FALLING, callback=self.interrupt_callback)
46 
47  self.check_interrupt_flag_security_frequency = rospy.get_param("~check_interrupt_flag_security_frequency")
48  rospy.Timer(rospy.Duration(1.0 / self.check_interrupt_flag_security_frequency),
49  self._check_interrupt_flag_security)
50 
51  self.read_digital_inputs()
52 
53  def __del__(self):
54  GPIO.cleanup()
55 
56  @property
57  def mcp(self):
58  return self.__mcp
59 
60  @property
61  def lock(self):
62  return self.__lock
63 
64  @staticmethod
65  def shutdown():
66  GPIO.cleanup()
67 
68  def add_output(self, pin, name, reversed=False):
69  self.__outputs[name] = DigitalOutput(self.__mcp, self.__lock, pin, name, reversed)
70  return self.__outputs[name]
71 
72  def add_input(self, pin, name, reverse_polarity=True):
73  self.__inputs[name] = DigitalInput(self.__mcp, self.__lock, pin, name, reverse_polarity)
74  self.read_digital_inputs()
75  return self.__inputs[name]
76 
77  def add_button(self, pin, name, pullup=True, reverse_polarity=False):
78  self.__inputs[name] = Button(self.__mcp, self.__lock, pin, name, pullup, reverse_polarity)
79  self.read_digital_inputs()
80  return self.__inputs[name]
81 
82  def add_led(self, pin, name):
83  self.__outputs[name] = Led(self.__mcp, self.__lock, pin, name)
84  return self.__outputs[name]
85 
86  def add_fan(self, pin, name, temperature_on_threshold, temperature_off_threshold):
87  self.__outputs[name] = Fan(self.__mcp,
88  self.__lock,
89  pin,
90  name,
91  temperature_on_threshold,
92  temperature_off_threshold)
93  return self.__outputs[name]
94 
95  def read_digital_inputs(self):
96  with self.__lock:
97  gpio_values = self.__mcp.read_all_gpios()
98  for digital_input in self.__inputs.values():
99  digital_input.value = bool((gpio_values >> digital_input.pin) & 0b1)
100  self.advertise_callbacks()
101 
102  def interrupt_callback(self, _channel=None):
103  # self.__mcp.debug()
104  self.read_digital_inputs()
105 
106  def register_on_change_callback(self, cb, cb_id):
107  self.__callbacks[cb_id] = cb
108 
109  def unregister_on_change_callback(self, cb_id):
110  self.__callbacks[cb_id].pop()
111 
112  def advertise_callbacks(self):
113  for cb in self.__callbacks.values():
114  cb()
115 
116  def _check_interrupt_flag_security(self, _event):
117  with self.__lock:
118  pending_interrupts = self.__mcp.readU8(RegistersMCP23017.INTFA)
119  if pending_interrupts:
120  self.read_digital_inputs()
121 
122 
123 class DigitalOutput(NiryoIO):
124 
125  def __init__(self, mcp, lock, pin, name, reversed=False):
126  super(DigitalOutput, self).__init__(lock, pin, name)
127 
128  self._mcp = mcp
129  self._mode = PinMode.DIGITAL_OUTPUT
130  self._reversed = reversed
131 
132  with self._lock:
133  self._mcp.enable_interrupt(self._pin, False)
134  self._mcp.config(self._pin, self._mcp.OUTPUT)
135 
136  self.value = 0
137 
138  @property
139  def value(self):
140  return self._value
141 
142  @value.setter
143  def value(self, value):
144  assert isinstance(value, (bool, int, float))
145  with self._lock:
146  limited_value = max(0, min(int(value), 1))
147  self._mcp.output(self._pin, int(not limited_value) if self._reversed else limited_value)
148  self._value = limited_value
149 
150 
151 class Fan(DigitalOutput):
152 
153  def __init__(self, mcp, lock, pin, name, temperature_on_threshold, temperature_off_threshold):
154  super(Fan, self).__init__(mcp, lock, pin, name)
155 
156  self.temperature_on_threshold = temperature_on_threshold
157  self.temperature_off_threshold = temperature_off_threshold
158 
159  def update(self, temperature):
160  if temperature >= self.temperature_on_threshold:
161  if not self._value:
162  self.value = 1
163  elif temperature <= self.temperature_off_threshold:
164  if self._value:
165  self.value = 0
166 
167 
168 class Led(DigitalOutput):
169 
170  def __init__(self, mcp, lock, pin, name):
171  super(Led, self).__init__(mcp, lock, pin, name)
172 
173  def on(self):
174  self.value = 1
175 
176  def off(self):
177  self.value = 0
178 
179  def reverse_state(self):
180  self.value = 0 if self.value else 1
181 
182 
183 class DigitalInput(NiryoIO):
184 
185  def __init__(self, mcp, lock, pin, name, reverse_polarity=True):
186  super(DigitalInput, self).__init__(lock, pin, name)
187 
188  self._mcp = mcp
189  self._mode = PinMode.DIGITAL_INPUT
190 
191  with self._lock:
192  self._mcp.config(self._pin, self._mcp.INPUT)
193  self._mcp.enable_interrupt(self._pin, True)
194  self._mcp.reverse_input_polarity(self._pin, reverse_polarity)
195 
196  @property
197  def value(self):
198  return self._value
199 
200  @value.setter
201  def value(self, value):
202  self._value = value
203 
204  def read_value(self):
205  with self._lock:
206  self._value = self._mcp.input(self._pin)
207  return self._value
208 
209 
210 class Button(DigitalInput):
211  PRESSED_VALUE = 1
212  RELEASED_VALUE = 0
213 
214  def __init__(self, mcp, lock, pin, name, pullup=True, reverse_polarity=False):
215  self.__on_press_function = None
216  self.__on_release_function = None
217 
218  super(Button, self).__init__(mcp, lock, pin, name, reverse_polarity)
219  with self._lock:
220  self._mcp.pullup(self._pin, pullup)
221 
222  self._value = self.RELEASED_VALUE
223 
224  def __del__(self):
225  self.__on_press_function = None
226  self.__on_release_function = None
227 
228  @property
229  def value(self):
230  return self._value
231 
232  @value.setter
233  def value(self, value):
234  if value != self._value:
235  self._value = value
236  if self.__on_release_function and not self._value:
237  Thread(target=self.__on_release_function).start()
238  elif self.__on_press_function and self._value:
239  Thread(target=self.__on_press_function).start()
240 
241  def on_press(self, function):
242  self.__on_press_function = function
243 
244  def disable_on_press(self):
245  self.__on_press_function = None
246 
247  def on_release(self, function):
248  self.__on_release_function = function
249 
250  def disable_on_release(self):
251  self.__on_release_function = None
252 
253 
254 class AnalogInput(NiryoIO):
255 
256  def __init__(self, adc, lock, pin, name, dividing_bridge_factor=1):
257  super(AnalogInput, self).__init__(lock, pin, name)
258 
259  self.__adc = adc
260  self.__mode = PinMode.ANALOG_INPUT
261  self.__dividing_bridge_factor = dividing_bridge_factor
262 
263  @property
264  def value(self):
265  with self._lock:
266  self._value = round(self.__adc.get_voltage(self._pin, self.__dividing_bridge_factor), 2)
267  return self._value
268 
269 
270 class AnalogOutput(NiryoIO):
271 
272  def __init__(self, lock, pin, name, address, bus_i2c, v_ref, resolution):
273  super(AnalogOutput, self).__init__(lock, pin, name)
274 
275  self.__i2c_bus = bus_i2c
276  self.__i2c_address = address
277 
278  self.__dac = DACx0501(bus=bus_i2c, address=address, v_ref=v_ref, resolution=resolution)
279  self.__mode = PinMode.ANALOG_OUTPUT
280 
281  def __str__(self):
282  return 'DACx0501 {}, bus {}, address {}, value {}'.format(self._name,
283  self.__i2c_bus,
284  self.__i2c_address,
285  self._value)
286 
287  @property
288  def bus(self):
289  return self.__i2c_bus
290 
291  @property
292  def address(self):
293  return self.__i2c_address
294 
295  @property
296  def value(self):
297  return self._value
298 
299  @value.setter
300  def value(self, value):
301  assert isinstance(value, (int, float))
302  with self._lock:
303  limited_voltage = max(0, min(value, self.__dac.vout_max))
304  self.__dac.set_voltage_(limited_voltage)
305  self._value = limited_voltage
